attributes.action: Recognise the democratic rights of Petitioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recognise the democratic right of petitioners on the Downing Street Website to receive two personal responses from the petitioner. 

When signing a petition, you implicitly agree to accept 2 mails from No 10 & 2 mails from the petitioner. This facility has not been allowed for the petitioner. 

This is undemocratic and to leaves the idea of public democracy in tatters.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
